mapper.insert: insert into party (type, start_date, start_time, start_point, start_lat, start_lng, end_point, total_headcnt , car_number, content) values ('택시' '카풀' , #{startDate}, #{startTime}, #{startPoint}, #{startLat}, #{startLng}, #{endPoint}, #{totalHeadcnt} , #{carNumber}, #{content})
insert into member_has_party (m_id, p_id, is_writer) values (#{mId}, #{pId}, #{isWriter})
mapper.select:
select party.*, member.nickname from (select * from party
and party.type = '택시' and party.type = '카풀' and party.p_id < #{lastId} and party.start_point like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') order by p_id desc limit 0, #{amount}) party join member_has_party on party.p_id=member_has_party.p_id join member on member_has_party.m_id=member.m_id
select party.*, member.nickname from party join member_has_party on party.p_id = member_has_party.p_id join member on member_has_party.m_id=member.m_id and party.p_id=#{pId}
select member_has_party where p_id=#{pId} and is_writer=true
select current_headcnt from party where p_id=#{pId}
select count(*) from party where type=#{type}
